title: Train fault causing delays on the North-South Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 北向南线列车故障导致延误
title_translations.ms: Kerosakan kereta api menyebabkan kelewatan di Laluan Utara-Selatan
title_translations.ta: வடக்கு-தெற்கு பாதையில் ஏற்படும் தாமதங்களுக்கு ரயில் பழுது

updates.text: UPDATE : [NSL] Free bus service from Toa Payoh to Marina Bay has ceased.
UPDATE : [NSL] Train service from Toa Payoh to Newton has resumed. Free bus service is still available from Toa Payoh to Marina Bay.
UPDATE : [NSL] Due to a train fault near Novena, please expect additional traveling time of 30 mins from Tao Payoh to Newton.
[NSL]: Estimate 30 mins additional travelling time from #ToaPayoh to #Marina Bay towards MarinaBay due to train fault.
